thread.section_title: The Darlington Hyde Park - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location, service and rooms were excellent
thread.title_full: Location, service and rooms were excellent - Review of The Darlington Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MnDaisy
title: Location, service and rooms were excellent
text:
We booked for three nights in a family room and were very pleased. Wifi is included. The bathroom had a lovely walk in shower with plenty of soaps, lotion, shampoo refilled every day. Our room was exceptionally quiet. Tea and coffee were in the room with some biscuits - one packet person - perfect upon returning from a day's outing.
Staff are all extremely helpful. The breakfast is both a continental and full hot breakfast. Staff in the breakfast room were superb in keeping items replenished and with their prompt, friendly service. We did notice a laundry room outside the breakfast room but did not use it.
The location is near Paddington Station, an easy two block walk. There are many good restaurants within a several block walking distance. Hyde Park is only about three blocks away.
We would not hesitate to recommend this hotel and will definitely return.
